description: Retrieves a Route 53 Profile association for a VPC. A VPC can have only one Profile association, but a Profile can be associated with up to 5000 VPCs.

parameters.name: ProfileAssociationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the association you want to get information about.

nested_items.name: ProfileAssociation
nested_items.description: Information about the Profile association that you specified in a GetProfileAssociation request.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Profile association was created, in Unix time format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: ModificationTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the Profile association was modified, in Unix time format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: OwnerId
nested_items.description: Amazon Web Services account ID of the Profile association owner.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VPC.

nested_items.name: StatusMessage
nested_items.description: Additional information about the Profile association.
